EmailTemplate.description: Auto-sent when trial request is rejected
EmailTemplate.name: MyCase Trial System Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: MyCase Trial Login
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Product_User__c.User_First_Name__c},
It looks like you have already started a trial with MyCase. You can access your account by logging in here.
Need help logging in and starting back up? Schedule a call with a MyCase representative or call (800) 571-8062 and we will be happy to assist.
Thank you,
The MyCase Team
------------------------------
Find Us Online --
www.mycase.com
